strapiPost.title: Today Marks 5th Annual NWA Gives
strapiPost.content:
NWA Gives is here! Today marks the fifth annual official day of giving to nonprofits and their causes across Northwest Arkansas. 

  • Region-wide: This year, 153 organizations across Benton, Washington, Carroll, Madison, Crawford, Franklin, and Sebastian counties have registered to participate in the 12-hour giving event. Since the first NWA Gives in 2018, the event has helped raise close to $4.5 million for local community services.
  • Giving: Benton County made was ranked as the most generous county in America last year. The vision is for the NWA community to do it again this year. Each participating nonprofit has its own fundraising page and promoting material on its respective social media. 

See the full list of nonprofits and give to their causes HERE.
